an5.10:1.1: “Pancahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu agaravo appatisso abhabbo imasmim dhammavinaye vuddhim virulhim vepullam apajjitum.
an5.10:1.3: Assaddho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu agaravo appatisso abhabbo imasmim dhammavinaye vuddhim virulhim vepullam apajjitum.
an5.10:1.4: Ahiriko, bhikkhave, bhikkhu agaravo appatisso abhabbo imasmim dhammavinaye vuddhim virulhim vepullam apajjitum.
an5.10:1.5: Anottappi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu agaravo appatisso abhabbo imasmim dhammavinaye vuddhim virulhim vepullam apajjitum.
an5.10:1.6: Kusito, bhikkhave, bhikkhu agaravo appatisso abhabbo imasmim dhammavinaye vuddhim virulhim vepullam apajjitum.
an5.10:1.7: Duppanno, bhikkhave, bhikkhu agaravo appatisso abhabbo imasmim dhammavinaye vuddhim virulhim vepullam apajjitum.
an5.10:1.8: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu agaravo appatisso abhabbo imasmim dhammavinaye vuddhim virulhim vepullam apajjitum.
an5.10:2.1: Pancahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu sagaravo sappatisso bhabbo imasmim dhammavinaye vuddhim virulhim vepullam apajjitum.
an5.10:2.3: Saddho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sagaravo sappatisso bhabbo imasmim dhammavinaye vuddhim virulhim vepullam apajjitum.
an5.10:2.4: Hirima, bhikkhave, bhikkhu …pe… ottappi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu …pe… araddhaviriyo, bhikkhave, bhikkhu …pe… pannava, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sagaravo sappatisso bhabbo imasmim dhammavinaye vuddhim virulhim vepullam apajjitum.
an5.10:2.5: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu sagaravo sappatisso bhabbo imasmim dhammavinaye vuddhim virulhim vepullam apajjitun”ti.
